name: Bunny Boom, Babe!
description:
Welcome to Bunny Boom, Babe! 

The ultimate bunny game, featuring very cute bunnies and pretty creepy bunnies.

We need you to bring balance to the bunny realm. If too many bunnies go for the same style, you should eat them. If a kind of bunnies prevails or you eat all the bunnies, you're out!

When the cute and creepy bunnies are well balanced, you win a star.

Are you ready to play Bunny Boom, Babe?
